definitions: the action of imposing on someone in an unwelcome or intrusive way

examples.text: they do the job with the minimum of fuss and obtrusion

shortDefinitions: action of imposing on someone in unwelcome or intrusive way

definitions: something that protrudes or projects outwards

examples.text: a large obtrusion blocked his view
obtrusions of igneous rock covered by sedimentary soils

shortDefinitions: something that protrudes or projects outwards
